import React, { useContext, useMemo } from 'react'; import { Avatar, Button, Form, Input, Tooltip } from 'antd'; import { UserAddOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons/lib/icons'; import { AppContext } from '../../Context/AppProvider'; import Message from './Message'; const ChatWindow = () => { const { rooms, selectedRoomId } = useContext(AppContext); const selectedRoom = useMemo(() => rooms.find((room) => room.id === selectedRoomId), [rooms, selectedRoomId] ); console.log({ rooms, selectedRoomId }); return (

{selectedRoom.name}

{selectedRoom.description}
A B C D
); } export default ChatWindow;
